name: THE JOKER (Aryan Jumani)
description:
Once upon a time, in a kingdom far away, the Kingdom of Kings went to capture the Kingdom Of Aces.

But while the King was at war an evil card took over the kingdom, THE JOKER.

Help the King save his Queen, his brother and kill THE JOKER by solving the puzzle THE JOKER has set for you

Remember, the King is the King and sometimes he may not obey your order. Best of Luck!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button to move the blocks.

The game is a simple Drag And Drop Game where you have to reach the cards other than the King to complete the level.

In the last level you need to get the key to move THE JOKER's block

Note: The game contains some glitches, beware!

Some assets got from these sites:
